content: final is a keyword. Beware! It has distinct meanings depending whether it is used for a class, a method, or for a variable. It must be placed before the variable type or the method return type. It is recommended to place it after the access modifier and after the static keyword.
stemmed: final keyword . bewar ! It distinct mean depend whether use class , method , variabl . It must place variabl type method return type . It recommend place access modifi static keyword .
